response.summary:
As a highly accomplished Electronics Engineer with an MSc in Telecommunications from the esteemed National University of Colombia, I possess over a decade of experience in the technology industry. I am widely acknowledged as a change agent, driven by a commitment to continuous improvement and strategic decision-making based on data-driven insights.

Throughout my career, I have undertaken a range of diverse tasks, including statistical analysis of commercial and technical indicators, optimization of mobile networks, development of cutting-edge software solutions, and administration of databases and geographic information systems. My in-depth expertise and skill set enables me to seamlessly adapt to new challenges and deliver outstanding results, ensuring the successful completion of complex projects with ease.

As a proactive and driven individual, I am passionate about leveraging my skills and experience to help businesses achieve their goals and optimize their operations. I take pride in my ability to think outside the box and approach problems from unique angles, always focusing on delivering the highest standards of quality and innovation.
response.skills: Financial Analysis, Data Science, Data Engineering, Lean Six Sigma, Python (Programming Language), SQL, English, French, Tableau, Pandas, Plotly, Amazon QuickSight, Keras, R, Linux, PHP, Project Management, Cybersecurity, Microsoft Excel, Geographic Information Systems (GIS)

profile_positions.description:
* Evaluate business processes to find opportunities to streamline, automate or deliver detailed solutions to sales teams across ALAC.
* Migrate 2 legacy WebServices, +30 Python/PHP ETL, and data-wrangling processes to cloud environments (GCP - AWS) implementing best practices such as backups, monitoring, alerts, optimizing cloud cost, and assuring sustainability.
* Development and deployment of +20 Tableau dashboards to provide key metrics to measure success over affordability, financing programs as well as sales ops in ALAC.
* Development and deployment of 2 web services over Dash/Ploty (Python frameworks) that process data from different sources such as APIs, Box, and offline plain files to provide critical metrics for the Regional Sales Ops team.
profile_positions.title: Business Systems SME

profile_positions.description:
* Design of a pricing model for smartphones based on FBProphet and implemented in Dash with Plotly. Mainly useful for measuring elasticity, simulating future demand, optimizing the current portfolio, and designing AB Testing campaigns.
* Design of a propensity algorithm for identifying customers to focus the efforts to stimulate the use of Mi Claro app, an application for own management, increasing the effectiveness of commercial campaigns 2x.
* Design a recommendation algorithm for Claro Video focused on engaging new customers and hooking current customers. Effectiveness is currently under measurement.
* Customer segmentation based on their current consumption in mobile applications identifying market niches to focus on marketing campaigns.
* Quantification of the Customer Lifetime Value, which allows identifying an economic margin per subscriber used for rewarding programs.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analytical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
* Functional leader of the experience analytics team, oriented to the reactive and proactive identification of opportunities in Claro's converged network and strategic investment decision making.
* Design of an experience score model for mobile subscribers employing data of Facebook focused on identifying areas for service improvements.
* Design of a classifier model of connected devices in the homes of Claro users aimed at identifying opportunities for commercial exploitation.
* Impact analysis of several commercial strategies and network improvement using the Lean6Sigma toolkit, summarizing the main findings and opportunities for continuous improvement in executive reports over Tableau.
* Change agent and evangelizer of the Lean Six Sigma benefits.
profile_positions.title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Engineered scripts in Bash to troubleshoot network management systems like NetAct or U2000, solving automatically 10% and preventing 5% of most common failures.
* Assumed the role of Technical Leader for fault management integration through CORBA/SNMP protocols between several NMS and an expert umbrella system, decreasing 3-4 weeks the average time taken for each configuration.
* Administration of legacy software developed in Javascript, PHP, and C++
* Evaluated the potential risks of new NMS according to SOX standards.
profile_positions.title: Network Management Systems Engineer II

profile_positions.description: Instructor of the online course Neural Networks in Keras and Scikit Learn, an introductory course about the use of neural networks for classification and regression problems through two of the most popular libraries in Python.
profile_positions.title: Instructor

profile_positions.description:
* Developed software tools in Javascript to handle the optimization of cellular networks, saving time identifying wrong settings of productive radio-stations.
* Implemented and Simulated the Telefónica mobile networks GSM/ UMTS/ LTE over Atoll software, achieving detailed coverage maps used to provided this information to the regulatory entity, subscribers, and planning department.
* Constructed a database to monitor the deployment of new antennas, saving 40% of the time to get reports, to identify the critical tasks and new locations.
* Syntonized the GSM network, to reorganize the available spectrum for the inclusion of a new carrier, achieving a reduction of 2% of drop call and setup failure.
profile_positions.title: Field Technician

profile_positions.description:
* Designed of reports, in Excel/QlikView, about key performance indicators of Telefónica cellular network, saving time to analyze macro-behaviors in Bogotá.
* Developed of macros in Excel to automate the settings of radio-access parameters for the implementation of new radio stations, saving time and double-checking the parameters for GSM and UMTS technologies.
* Audited internal processes and work-orders flow, suggesting a new way to reorganize the radio access engineering department.
profile_positions.title: RF Engineering Internship

profile_positions.description:
* Evaluated a non-uniform sampler based on "level crossing principle" and asynchronous digital architectures, regarding power consumption, proving its viability to be applied to medical implants or high-autonomous sensors.
* Formulated a synchronous version of the sampler, verifying the consumption gain of the sampler and synthesizing the work made in a paper submitted to the Symposium on Integrated Circuits 2014 held in Aracaju, Brazil.
profile_positions.title: Internship in the Concurrent Integrated System group

profile_positions.description:
* Welding and assembling of components.
* Quality control of fabricated electronic ballast.
* Mesure of variables such as power consumption, luminous intensity, THD among others.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student

company.name: Apple
company.description:
We’re a diverse collective of thinkers and doers, continually reimagining what’s possible to help us all do what we love in new ways. And the same innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices — strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it. This is where your work can make a difference in people’s lives. Including your own.

Apple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. Visit apple.com/careers to learn more.
